name: Engineer Fratelli
description:
Controls:

Character 1 = WSAD
Character 2 = Arrow Keys

It's time to clean the mess! In Engineer Fratelli, you play as two engineer brothers who are responsible for cleaning the spacial elevator from the monsters. They can't fall on they elevator, so zap them with your lazer! but be careful with the obstacles, they will deactivate your tool, so keep calm and try to control both characters at the same time!

Blue block = Smashes you
Green block = Disable your beam
Orange block = Kills you
